data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy Tab A, 6.0.1 and Samsung Galaxy S3 Neo, 5.1.2, CynagonMod
data.actual_result: There is "Unmute", not "Mute". Also nothing happens on pressing it.
data.short_description: Long Press in Channels in MUTED SERVERS always shows "Unmute".
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a MUTED Server or mute one - Long Press in an unmuted Channel - Press "Mute"
